Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Foster
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Foster, Ashland and Clark: due to, parade/festival near Clark/Foster.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Foster, Ashland, Clark and over regular route due to a parade/festival near Clark/Foster.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Grand/Division
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Homan, Augusta, Pulaski, Armitage, Kimball due to, street blockage near Grand/Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Homan, Augusta, Pulaski, Armitage, Kimball, resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Grand/Division.

Allow extra travel time.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Washington/LaSalle
ShortDescription: Eastbound J14 Jeffery Jump, 20 Madison, 56 Milwaukee and 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temp. rerouted due to protests/march activity near Washington/LaSalle.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Eastbound #J14 Jeffery Jump, #20 Madison, #56 Milwaukee and #60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via Washington, LaSalle, Jackson, State, Washington and over regular route: due to protests/march activity near Washington/LaSalle.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #72 North Temporary Reroute at North Ave/Central Park
ShortDescription: Revised: 72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Ave, Pulaski, Armitage, Milwaukee & North Ave, due to street blockage near North Ave/Central Park

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: #72 North buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via North Ave, Pulaski, Armitage, Milwaukee, then resume their normal route on North Ave, due to street blockage near North Ave/Central Park.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Logan Square
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Logan Square due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Logan Square due to a sick customer.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
